name: Xiah Legends
description: Xiah is a free to play martial arts MMO from Taewool and xiahlegends.com that blends RPG content with the feel of console action games. It offers detailed graphics and creature AI, with traditional leveling, and when players level up, the game's rebirth system allows them to start over with experience intact and special bonuses. The game has four character classes, including Mage, Sword Man, Ghost Fighter, and Warrior, and weapons can be upgraded with five elemental types. PvP is featured in the form of guild sieges as well as solo modes. Xiah is free to play, with an item shop.
